Bonus Percentage |- | Why is my Voltorb Upside Down? || Obtain your first Pokéball || +0.05% |- | Starting a Collection || Obtain 10 Pokéball || +0.14% |- | Stocking Up || Obtain 100 Pokéball || +0.23% |- | Fully Stocked || Obtain 1,000 Pokéball || +0.45% |- | Maybe just a few more for the bunker || Obtain 10,000 Pokéball || +0.68% |- | Doomsday Bunker stocked with Pokéballs! || Obtain 100,000 Pokéball || +0.90% |- | ooooo A blue one! || Obtain your first Greatball || +0.14% |- | Greatball 2 || Obtain 10 Greatball || +0.23% |- | Greatball 3 || Obtain 100 Greatball || +0.45% |- | Greatball 4 || Obtain 1,000 Greatball || +0.68% |- | Greatball 5 || Obtain 10,000 Greatball || +0.90% |- | Greatball 6 || Obtain 100,000 Greatball || +1.35% |- | Ultraball 1 || Obtain your first Ultraball || +0.23% |- | Ultraball 2 || Obtain 10 Ultraball || +0.45% |- | Ultraball 3 || Obtain 100 Ultraball || +0.68% |- | Ultraball 4 || Obtain 1,000 Ultraball || +0.90% |- | Ultraball 5 || Obtain 10,000 Ultraball || +1.35% |- | Ultraball 5 || Obtain 100,000 Ultraball || +1.80% |- | Masterball 1 || Obtain your first Masterball || +0.90% |- | Masterball 2 || Obtain 10 Masterball || +1.35% |- | Masterball 3 || Obtain 100 Masterball || +1.80% |}
